alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 8:50PM CDT until July 30 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Miami County in east central Kansas... Linn County in east central Kansas... Southern Cass County in west central Missouri... Henry County in west central Missouri... Bates County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Pettis County in central Missouri... South central Lafayette County in west central Missouri... Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 849 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Grove to near Archie to near Parker, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Harrisonville, Clinton, Osawatomie, Butler, Windsor, Knob Noster, Holden, Adrian, Garden City, Rich Hill, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Whiteman Air Force Base, Archie, Drexel, Linn Valley, Leeton and Urich. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
